markdownRemark.html:
I just started watching his videos back in October 2016 and the rest is history…

Casey Neistat.

There is no amount of words to thank this guy, he practically ripped whatever I had known for ten years working as an accountant in Dubai, Malabo and Manila. He flipped my way of framing the world and distorted my understanding of how life works - him being a single dad at age 17 and striving to become one of YouTube’s elite filmmakers is a story worth remembering time and time again. Tons of articles have been written about his crazy videos.
